title: Eldritch Ritual Chamber Adventure #54
goal: Solve the puzzles, achieve the main objective, and escape.

rooms.name: Ritual Antechamber
rooms.description: A dimly lit stone chamber with walls covered in strange glowing runes. Candles flicker with unnatural green flames, casting dancing shadows. The air is thick with incense and an otherworldly hum resonates through the floor. Ancient symbols are carved into every surface, and a heavy wooden door blocks the way forward.

items.name: small stone altar
items.description: A waist-high altar covered in ritual markings and dried wax

items.name: ceremonial dagger
items.description: An ornate dagger with eldritch symbols etched into the blade

items.name: ancient bookshelf
items.description: A tall shelf filled with leather-bound tomes and scrolls

items.name: tome of forbidden rituals
items.description: A heavy book bound in strange leather, its pages filled with arcane knowledge
items.text: The Great Ritual was performed on the 13th day of the 6th month in the year 66. The High Priest Azathoth commanded three acolytes: Keeper Nyarlathotep, Scribe Yog-Sothoth, and Guardian Shub-Niggurath. The ritual requires three sacred artifacts to complete.

items.name: carved wooden chest
items.description: An ornate chest with three compartments, each marked with different symbols

items.name: high priest's journal
items.description: A journal with entries written in dark ink
items.text: Journal Entry: The ritual chamber beyond holds the secrets of the Old Ones. I, High Priest Azathoth, have sealed the inner sanctum. Only those who know the three sacred elements may enter: the source of our power, the place of our gathering, and the vessel of transformation.

items.name: tarnished brass key
items.description: A heavy brass key with eldritch symbols engraved on its surface

items.name: ritual cabinet
items.description: A tall cabinet with a brass lock, containing ritual supplies

items.name: obsidian orb
items.description: A perfectly smooth black sphere that seems to absorb light, one of the sacred artifacts

items.name: heavy stone door
items.description: A massive door carved with writhing tentacles and cosmic horrors. It requires the ceremonial dagger to open.

rooms.name: Main Ritual Chamber
rooms.description: A vast circular chamber with a domed ceiling painted with constellations that seem to move. Five stone statues of robed figures stand in a circle around a central pentagram carved into the floor. Torches burn with purple flames, and the walls are covered with inscriptions in an ancient language. An archway to the east leads to the inner sanctum.

items.name: statue of the Keeper
items.description: A hooded figure holding a staff topped with an eye symbol
items.text: Inscription at base: 'Keeper Nyarlathotep - Guardian of the Void Star, source of all eldritch power.'

items.name: statue of the Scribe
items.description: A robed figure clutching ancient scrolls
items.text: Inscription at base: 'Scribe Yog-Sothoth - Recorder of rituals performed in the Circle of Stones, our sacred gathering place.'

items.name: statue of the Guardian
items.description: A towering figure with multiple arms holding ritual implements
items.text: Inscription at base: 'Guardian Shub-Niggurath - Protector of the Chalice of Souls, vessel of transformation and rebirth.'

items.name: statue of High Priest Azathoth
items.description: The central statue, larger than the others, depicting a figure in elaborate robes
items.text: Inscription at base: 'High Priest Azathoth - Master of the ritual, keeper of the three sacred artifacts needed to open the gateway.'

items.name: statue of an acolyte
items.description: A smaller statue of a kneeling figure
items.text: Inscription at base: 'The faithful acolyte - Those who serve shall be rewarded with passage through the gateway.'

items.name: carved pentagram
items.description: A large pentagram carved into the stone floor, with strange symbols at each point

items.name: silver amulet
items.description: A crescent-shaped amulet made of tarnished silver, another sacred artifact

items.name: central stone pedestal
items.description: A pedestal in the center of the pentagram with a locked compartment

items.name: scroll of summoning
items.description: An ancient scroll with instructions for the final ritual
items.text: To complete the ritual and open the gateway, speak the sacred number: the number of perfection, repeated thrice. The combination is 777.

items.name: wall inscriptions
items.description: Ancient text carved into the chamber walls
items.text: The ritual chamber holds many secrets. The pedestal's lock opens with the sacred number of perfection: seven, seven, seven.

items.name: archway to inner sanctum
items.description: An ornate archway covered in pulsing runes. Three questions are inscribed on a stone tablet beside it.

password_questions.question: What is the source of eldritch power?
password_questions.hint: Check the inscription on the Keeper's statue

password_questions.question: Where do the rituals take place?
password_questions.hint: Read the Scribe's statue inscription carefully

password_questions.question: What is the vessel of transformation?

rooms.name: Inner Sanctum
rooms.description: You have entered the heart of the ritual chamber! The room pulses with eldritch energy. In the center stands an altar with three indentations for sacred artifacts. Above it, a swirling portal of cosmic light and shadow offers escape from this place. Strange whispers echo from beyond reality, and the very air seems to bend and twist.

items.name: altar of artifacts
items.description: A black stone altar with three circular indentations, each marked with a different symbol
items.text: Inscription: 'Place the three sacred artifacts upon this altar to activate the gateway and escape this realm. The obsidian orb, the silver amulet, and the golden chalice must be united.'

items.name: ritual preparation table
items.description: A table covered with ritual implements and offerings

items.name: golden chalice
items.description: An ornate chalice made of pure gold, engraved with cosmic symbols, the final sacred artifact

items.name: gateway of light
items.description: A swirling portal of otherworldly energy. It requires all three sacred artifacts to fully activate and allow passage.

items.name: cosmic murals
items.description: Paintings depicting the rise and fall of ancient civilizations
items.text: The murals show the history of the ritual chamber: built by cultists who sought to bridge the gap between worlds. Those who complete the ritual may pass through the gateway to freedom.

rooms.name: Beyond the Veil
rooms.description: You step through the gateway and find yourself in a place between worlds. The eldritch chamber fades behind you as reality reasserts itself. You have survived the ritual chamber and escaped with forbidden knowledge. The cosmic horrors recede, and you are free.

items.name: anchor to reality
items.description: A shimmering point of light that represents your connection to the normal world

rooms.win_message: You have successfully completed the eldritch ritual and escaped the chamber! The three sacred artifacts merge into pure energy as you pass through the gateway. The cosmic horrors acknowledge your worthiness, and you return to reality forever changed by what you have witnessed. The ritual chamber seals itself behind you, its secrets preserved. You win!
